info.title: GSA IAE Opportunity Modernization

get.summary: Download all attachments from an opportunity

Check if solicitation number is unique. A solicitation number is unique if it is not used by another opportunity of equivalent type. For justification type, j&a and fair opportunity/limited sources justification are considered equivalent.

get.description: Get IVL by DUNS for contract opportunity.
